name: recurring-transactions-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function to process recurring incomes and fixed costs

scripts.build: tsc && cd dist && for f in *.js; do mv "$f" "${f%.js}.mjs"; done && cd ..
scripts.package: rm -f recurring-transactions-lambda.zip && zip recurring-transactions-lambda.zip package.json package-lock.json tsconfig.json && zip -r recurring-transactions-lambda.zip dist/ && npm install --omit=dev && zip -ur recurring-transactions-lambda.zip node_modules && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run package
